h1_title: Chapter 1 Secret - Ancient Guanyin Temple Walkthrough
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Elder Jinchi
content: The good news is they don’t move all that fast, and must stop for a moment before finally exploding. All you need to do is lead them on a merry chase, and zigzag around to cause them to begin to explode before dashing away. Once no more glowing zombies are near you, resume your fight against Jinchi.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_1_Secret-Ancient_Guanyin_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 1 Secret - Ancient Guanyin Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Elder Jinchi'.
The content is as follows:
The good news is they don’t move all that fast, and must stop for a moment before finally exploding. All you need to do is lead them on a merry chase, and zigzag around to cause them to begin to explode before dashing away. Once no more glowing zombies are near you, resume your fight against Jinchi.
